front.title: A mechanism for synchronization across name servers on zone creation

abstract.t: This memo describes the NEWZONE_NOTIFY opcode for DNS, by which aprimary master server advises a set of slave servers that there arezones that has been created and that queries should be initiated todiscover the new zone data.This draft also specifies a mechanism for the slave servers toachieve authenticated synchronization of zone data as well as zonesynchronization information with the primary when zones are createdon the primary.
